definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: Applicants should not be receiving any other bursary schemes.
sentences.chinese: 申请者不应是其他助学金计划的领受者。

sentences.english: The one who can accept this should accept it.
sentences.chinese: 这话谁能领受，就可以领受。

sentences.english: The one who can accept this should accept it.
sentences.chinese: 这话谁能领受，就可以领受。

sentences.english: How do we receive and keep the peace in Christ?
sentences.chinese: 如何领受并持守在基督里的平安？

sentences.english: There's been a death take place in their life and an impartation of righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 他们在生命中经历过死亡，并且领受了公义。

sentences.english: In the garden he was already accepting this load.
sentences.chinese: 在客西马尼园中，他已经预备好领受这一切。

sentences.english: This course is offered only to those in or preparing for ordained ministry.
sentences.chinese: 本课程只接受已领受或准备领受圣秩职务的人士报读。

sentences.english: This course is offered only to those in or preparing for ordained ministry.
sentences.chinese: 本课程只接受已领受或准备领受圣秩职务的人士报读。

sentences.english: And when the prince of pastors shall appear, you shall receive a never fading crown of glory.
sentences.chinese: 这样，当总司牧出现时，你们必领受那不朽的荣冠。

sentences.english: He accepted his comrades' criticisms and suggestions with an open mind.
sentences.chinese: 他虚心领受同志们的批评建议。

sentences.english: Apply your heart to instruction and your ears to words of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 你要留心领受训诲，侧耳听从知识的言语。

sentences.english: Why did you eat the Lord’s Supper?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么要领受主的圣餐呢？

sentences.english: She opened her mouth to receive the papery - thin wafer .
sentences.chinese: 她张开嘴领受薄薄的圣饼。

sentences.english: At your feet they all bow down, and from you receive instruction
sentences.chinese: 他们坐在他的脚下，领受他的言语。

sentences.english: For the uninitiated this is a particularly good time to go.
sentences.chinese: 对于外行人而言，这是一个领受艺术的绝好机会。

sentences.english: My son, if you accept my words and store up my commands within you.
sentences.chinese: 我儿，你若领受我的言语，存记我得命令。

definition: God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
(third person pronoun for a divine being)
